original_title: Mr. Henry's Wild & Wacky World: Scared and Brave?
overview: Mr. Henry explores courage with an animated story about Shadrach, Meshach & Abednego, a visit with his twin brother Professor Henry, a song with his bluegrass band, and a "spontaneous re-enactment" of the story of David and Goliath. Discover the truth about COURAGE.
title: Mr. Henry's Wild & Wacky World: Scared and Brave?
